title: Spinning the QB Carousel
itunes:title: Spinning the QB Carousel
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news surrounding the NFL including the Chargers saying goodbye to Philip Rivers (8:25), Taysom Hill wanting to be a franchise QB (17:39) and the possibility of flexing MNF games. (23:13) The heroes spin the QB Carousel to determine where they think these big name QBs will land. (47:55).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
